TextBlock.Text: -krs-zkt-
ILEX: -ink I fixed the recorder? Yeah, look, it's turning!
IDAEA: See, I knew you you could do it.
ILEX: But you were watching the whole time, weren't you afraid I was doing it wrong?
IDAEA: Oh... Ilex, no, no, I'm so sorry if I gave you that impression.
IDAEA: I just want to be sure you're safe. Our technology uses a lot of energy; it's dangerous to work on it alone.
ILEX: Is that why so many of us work in groups?
IDAEA: That's right. Phlox and Daz, Ramie and Pye-
ILEX: You and mom?
ILEX: Dad?
IDAEA: Yes. Me and your mom.
ILEX: What was she like?
ILEX: Please? You never talk about her.
IDAEA: She, um... -sigh- She was as brilliant as she was beautiful. I don't think I've ever met anyone smarter than her.
IDAEA: I'd never s- ... s-sorry, I just-
ILEX: Dad? What's wrong, are you okay?
IDAEA: ... yes, I'm okay. I'm okay. I just miss her very much.
IDAEA: I'd never seen her happier than when she first saw you. She held you so gently, as if you'd break if she breathed too sharply.
IDAEA: It's funny, she was usually such a daredevil.
ILEX: Wait, really?! And she liked you?!
IDAEA: Pfhaha, yes, I know, right? I can't believe she put up with me!
ILEX: You're such a worrier!
IDAEA: I know! I know. But she got me to take risks, and be a little more adventurous. I like to think I calmed her down in return.
ILEX: She sounds fun!
IDAEA: She was fun. Every day with her was better than the last. You know, you're just like her in all the best ways. Even if you do worry like me!
IDAEA: Ah, come here, give your dad a hug. Nghaahhh there's my little monster!
ILEX: Daaaaaaad! I'm not that little...
IDAEA: I love you more than everything in the world, I hope you know that. I would pull the planets out of their orbits just to keep you safe.
ILEX: I love you too, dad. But please leave the planets where they are.
IDAEA: Haha. I'll do my best.
IDAEA: We'll be okay, Ilex.
IDAEA: We'll be okay.
